document.full_text: online advertising revenue in 2010 reached a record high of $26 billion, a 15 percent increase over 2009, according to a report by the interactive advertising bureau and pricewaterhousecoopers.
document.title: online ad revenue continues to rise
lines_and_colors: online advertising revenue in 2010 reached a record high of $26 billion, a 15 percent increase over 2009, according to a report by the interactive advertising bureau and pricewaterhousecoopers.
